alert.note: Alert for Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 12:49PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ... Areas of Falling and Blowing Snow Expected Thursday into Early Saturday... West to northwest winds will increase along the North Slope late tonight into early Saturday morning, with a forecast for between 3 to 5 inches of snow expected. Some higher amounts will be possible at higher elevations, with gusts upwards to 35 mph possible. The falling snow and increasing winds may result low visibility, along with some drifting along the roadway in some areas, especially higher elevation passes. It is still uncertain how low visibility will be due to the overall lower wind speeds, but the combination of falling snow and and increasing winds will lead to some impacts in these areas.

area.areaDesc: Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range
